channel.title: ConsumerTopic on Documentation of php-simple-kafka-client
channel.description: Recent content in ConsumerTopic on Documentation of php-simple-kafka-client

item.title: getName
item.description: Description public function getName(): string {} Get topic name Example $conf = new Kafka\Configuration(); $conf->set('auto.offset.reset', 'earliest'); $consumer = new Kafka\Consumer($conf); $consumerTopic = $consumer->getTopicHandle('test-topic'); echo sprintf('Topic name: %s', $consumerTopic->getName()) . PHP_EOL;
